content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and my latest action was to receive a command from the user to Google "fun and interesting places to visit and things to do". I returned a list of websites with information on top vacation spots and activities in various locations.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "def compare_options(options, criteria, weights):\\n    scores = {}\\n    for option in options:\\n        score = 0\\n        for i, criterion in enumerate(criteria):\\n            score += weights[i] * option[criterion]\\n        scores[option[\'name\']] = score\\n    return max(scores, key=scores.get)\\n\\noptions = [\\n    {\'name\': \'New York City\', \'cost\': 500, \'distance\': 1000, \'rating\': 4.5},\\n    {\'name\': \'San Francisco\', \'cost\': 800, \'distance\': 1500, \'rating\': 4.8},\\n    {\'name\': \'Miami\', \'cost\': 700, \'distance\': 2000, \'rating\': 4.3},\\n    {\'name\': \'Chicago\', \'cost\': 600, \'distance\': 1200, \'rating\': 4.6},\\n    {\'name\': \'Seattle\', \'cost\': 900, \'distance\': 1800, \'rating\': 4.7}\\n]\\ncriteria = [\'cost\', \'distance\', \'rating\']\\nweights = [0.4, 0.3, 0.3]\\nbest_option = compare_options(options, criteria, weights)\\nprint(\'The best option is:\', best_option)"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
